greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of 1 - Sum_{k=1..n} (-1)^(k+1)/prime(k)^2.
comment: It seems that the denominator of 1 - Sum_{k=1..n} (-1)^(k+1)/prime(k)^2 is A061742(n), which is the square of the product of the first n primes, but this is not immediately obvious. - _Petros Hadjicostas_, May 14 2020
program: (PARI) a(n) = numerator(1 - sum(k=1, n, (-1)^(k+1)/prime(k)^2)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 14 2020
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Dec 27 2007
